this is where you belong

# BITSY VERSION 3.4

! ROOM_FORMAT 1

POS 6 8,10

DLG a
I'm praying

DLG f
gfnfgnff

DLG e
fsnsfgc

DLG d
ergfgcbcvb

DLG c
sdfsdfsdf

DLG m
i don't want to be here.

DLG l
i'm so big and loud and ugly. i want to disappear.

DLG n
i don't know what you want but please go away.

DLG o
i don't think i want to go any further.

DLG p
i don't know where to go. 

DLG q
maybe i belong here?

DLG s
hello there.

END 0
i am no good anywhere else. this is where i belong.

END 1
i am better here than there. this is where i belong.
